attributes.action: Employees with underlying health conditions in Covid 19 should be furlough.
attributes.additional_details:
People with underlying health conditions who have been told By their GPS/Surgery that you are at high risk to Covid 19 and advised to stay home for next 12 weeks should be furlough under Govt job retention scheme.They can’t live With SSP which is £94.25 per week.High risk venerable should be treated fairly like everybody else.
Why they  forgotten.?
Govt policy Should be amended for people with underlying health conditions as they need extra support at this stage and should be made furlough.
attributes.background: Employees with underlying health conditions who are at high risk to Covid19 and advised by NHS/GPs to stay at home for 12 weeks should be made  furlough Under Govt job retention scheme.They will get only SSP £94.25 PW by their employers.This isn’t fair with employees who are at high risk to Covid 19

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310424.
